IngredientType: CREATE TABLE IngredientType (id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, ingredientType VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE);
IngredientOrigin: CREATE TABLE IngredientOrigin (id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, ingredientOrigin VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE);
Ingrediens: CREATE TABLE Ingredients (id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, rarity INT, ingredientType INT, A INT, B INT, C INT, D INT, E INT, total INT, taste BOOLEAN, sensation BOOLEAN, aroma BOOLEAN, visual BOOLEAN, sound BOOLEAN, base_price INT, ingredientOrigin INT, FOREIGN KEY (ingredientType) REFERENCES IngredientType(id), FOREIGN KEY (ingredientOrigin) REFERENCES IngredientOrigin(id));
PotionQuality: CREATE TABLE PotionQuality (tier VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY, zeroStar INT, oneStar INT, twoStar INT, threeStar INT, fourStar INT, fiveStar INT);
PotionType: CREATE TABLE PotionType (id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, potionType VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE);
Potions: CREATE TABLE Potions (potionName VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY, potionType INT, A INT, B INT, C INT, D INT, E INT, FOREIGN KEY (potionType) REFERENCES PotionType(id));
